name: Create new files in Google Drive from new media responses in VideoAsk
description:
Every time a new response containing media (video or text) is received in VideoAsk, response media files will be instantly uploaded to a new folder in Google Drive.

Even though the template configuration looks complicated, you don't have be afraid. It's quite simple to set up and only a few inputs are required from you.

The template expects your VideoAsk to collect contact details of the submitter.
